med1.name: Piles
med1.title: Blood vessels in and around the anus get swollen and cause pain

med1.name: Lipoma
med1.title: Fat-based tissue lump that grows just beneath the skin

med1.name: Bariatric
med1.title: Performed to help curb excessive weight gain in case other methods do not work

med1.name: Fistula
med1.title: A condition causing abnormal linking of two body parts

med1.name: Fissure
med1.title: A tear in the tissue lining the anus that causes bleeding

med1.name: Pilonidal Sinus
med1.title: A hole forms in the skin near the tailbone with hair and skin

med1.name: Varicose Veins
med1.title: Veins get enlarged and twisted, generally near the legs and feet

med1.name: Phimosis
med1.title: Inability to retract skin covering the head of the penis

med1.name: Hydrocele
med1.title: Swelling of the scrotum due to fluid build-up around the testicle

med1.name: Cataract
med1.title: The lenses of the eyes become cloudy and disrupt clear vision

med1.name: Lasik
med1.title: A laser surgery that permanantly corrects vision

med1.name: Hernia
med1.title: A condition where an internal organ bulges out abnormally

med1.name: Gallbladder
med1.title: Removal of gallbladder due to the deposite of stone/infection in it

med1.name: Appendix
med1.title: Inflammation of the appendix due to the accumulation of pus

med1.name: Knee Replacement
med1.title: Procedure performed on the knee to replace the joint partially or fully

med1.name: Gynecomastia
med1.title: Noticiable swelling of breast tissues in boys and men

med1.name: Lipoma
med1.title: Fat-based tissue lump that grows just beneath the skin

med1.name: Bariatric
med1.title: Performed to help curb excessive weight gain in case other methods do not work

med1.name: Breast Cancer
med1.title: Uncontrolled growth of abnormal cells in a body part/organ

med1.name: Arthroscopy
med1.title: Minimally invasive procedure to diagnose and treat problems in your joints

med1.name: Hip Replacement
med1.title: Prosthetic components are used to replace damaged bone and cartilage

med1.name: Liposuction
med1.title: A surgical procedure used to remove excess fat

med3.name: Shreevant Tiwari
med3.comment: My Care Expert got me a surgery package that included everything from my tests to the surgery cost. I also received a PharmEasy Plus membership for free after my surgery. PharmEasy keeps its promise.

med3.name: Vijaylakshmi Ravishankar
med3.comment: I am happy to have found PharmEasy. I was surprised to receive such excellent care even after my surgery. I really appreciate the quality of service provided. I would recommend PharmEasy to everyone going for elective surgeries.

med3.name: Anindya Roy
med3.comment: Getting a surgery done without undergoing the hassles of insurance and paperwork was a first in my life. The Care Expert handles everything and I would highly recommend their service.

med3.name: Sagarika Jaiswal
med3.comment: PharmEasy handled my mother’s laser piles surgery with great care. The Care Expert arranged for our travel to the hospital and back home. We could even consult the doctor online which saved my mother a lot of trouble. She is recovering well and I am thankful to PharmEasy.

med3.name: Ethel D’Souza
med3.comment: Absolutely recommend PharmEasy for surgeries. Got my surgery done at a reputed hospital that too within my budget. Discounts from PharmEasy are great considering the premium service they provide.

med3.name: Alefiya Springwala
med3.comment: I could not believe that my husband’s operation was completed within a day and he was discharged without any hassle. PharmEasy handled everything for us- from the insurance to the paperwork at the hospital.

med3.name: Aadil Rashid
med3.comment: I am very thankful to PharmEasy. They helped me get my surgery done from a great hospital. On top of that, the option of interest-free EMI payments made it possible for me to avail of this service. PharmEasy is a great option when it comes to excellent medical care at an affordable cost.

med3.name: Harsh Akolkar
med3.comment: Got my father’s piles surgery done through PharmEasy. Their constant support is highly appreciated because they handled everything- from scheduling doctor’s appointments to post-surgery care. We are thankful to the doctors who helped my father undergo this surgery.

med3.name: Vedika Maheshwari
med3.comment: Pre-operative and post-operative care provided by PharmEasy is top-notch. I got my mother’s laser piles surgery done through PharmEasy and follow-up doctor consultations were really helpful. I even received a 1-year subscription to PharmEasy Plus for free. I would recommend people to go for PharmEasy surgeries.
